languages.text: "Если так будет продолжаться и дальше, ума не приложу, к чему это способно привести! Существуют миры, охваченные войной на протяжении поколений... поколений, Ваша Светлость! Как та безумная планета у Безымянной Звезды — совсем недалеко от нашей мирной системы. Говорят, тамошним обывателям покровительствует Вольный Торговец Винтерскейл — подумать страшно, что он там устроил!"

"If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"
languages.original_text: "Если так будет продолжаться и дальше, ума не приложу, к чему это способно привести! Существуют миры, охваченные войной на протяжении поколений... поколений, Ваша Светлость! Как та безумная планета у Безымянной Звезды — совсем недалеко от нашей мирной системы. Говорят, тамошним обывателям покровительствует Вольный Торговец Винтерскейл — подумать страшно, что он там устроил!"

There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

"If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

languages.text: “如果事情继续这样发展下去，我简直不敢想象可能会发生什么情况！有的世界一直在被战争蹂躏，持续了整整几代人……整整几代人，大人！就像无名星旁边那个疯狂的行星一样，他们离我们这个和平的星系是如此之近。据说，那里的居民生活在行商浪人温特斯凯尔的庇护之下，我简直不敢想象他把那个地方变成了什么样子！”
languages.original_text: "If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

traits.locale_text: “如果事情继续这样发展下去，我简直不敢想象可能会发生什么情况！有的世界一直在被战争蹂躏，持续了整整几代人……整整几代人，大人！就像无名星旁边那个疯狂的行星一样，他们离我们这个和平的星系是如此之近。据说，那里的居民生活在行商浪人温特斯凯尔的庇护之下，我简直不敢想象他把那个地方变成了什么样子！”

languages.text: «¡De prolongarse esta situación, no me atrevo ni a imaginar cómo podríamos acabar! Hay mundos desgarrados por la guerra durante generaciones... ¡generaciones, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Como aquel planeta enloquecido junto a la estrella Sin Nombre, tan cerca de nuestro pacífico sistema. Sus habitantes debían estar bajo la protección del Comerciante Independiente Winterscale... ¡no quiero pensar en lo que habrá ocasionado allí!».
languages.original_text: "If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

traits.locale_text: «¡De prolongarse esta situación, no me atrevo ni a imaginar cómo podríamos acabar! Hay mundos desgarrados por la guerra durante generaciones... ¡generaciones, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Como aquel planeta enloquecido junto a la estrella Sin Nombre, tan cerca de nuestro pacífico sistema. Sus habitantes debían estar bajo la protección del Comerciante Independiente Winterscale... ¡no quiero pensar en lo que habrá ocasionado allí!».

languages.text: 「こんな無駄が続くなら、どうなってしまうのか想像すらしたくありません！何世代も…何世代も続く戦争で荒廃した世界なんて、陛下！名もなき星にめちゃくちゃにされた星のように…平穏なシステムまであと一歩であります。そこの住民はおそらく、自由開拓者ウィンタースケールの庇護下で暮らしています。そこで彼が作りだしていたものを考えるだけで、身震いするんです！」
languages.original_text: "If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

traits.locale_text: 「こんな無駄が続くなら、どうなってしまうのか想像すらしたくありません！何世代も…何世代も続く戦争で荒廃した世界なんて、陛下！名もなき星にめちゃくちゃにされた星のように…平穏なシステムまであと一歩であります。そこの住民はおそらく、自由開拓者ウィンタースケールの庇護下で暮らしています。そこで彼が作りだしていたものを考えるだけで、身震いするんです！」

languages.text: "Wenn das so weitergeht, will ich mir gar nicht vorstellen, wo es enden könnte! Manche Welten werden seit Generationen vom Krieg verwüstet ... seit Generationen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wie dieser gestörte Planet beim Namenlosen Stern – ganz in der Nähe unseres eigenen friedlichen Systems. Die Einwohner stehen angeblich unter dem Schutz von Freihändler Winterzunder – mir graut bei dem Gedanken, was er dort geschaffen hat!"
languages.original_text: "If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das so weitergeht, will ich mir gar nicht vorstellen, wo es enden könnte! Manche Welten werden seit Generationen vom Krieg verwüstet ... seit Generationen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wie dieser gestörte Planet beim Namenlosen Stern – ganz in der Nähe unseres eigenen friedlichen Systems. Die Einwohner stehen angeblich unter dem Schutz von Freihändler Winterzunder – mir graut bei dem Gedanken, was er dort geschaffen hat!"

languages.text: « Je n'ose imaginer les conséquences auxquelles nous nous exposons si la situation n'est pas réglée rapidement ! Il existe des mondes qui sont ravagés par la guerre pendant des générations... Des générations, Votre Seigneurie ! Comme cette planète dérangée près de l'étoile sans nom, si proche de notre système paisible. Il paraît que ses habitants vivent sous la protection du libre-marchand Winterscale... Je tremble à l'idée de ce qu'il a pu créer là-bas ! »
languages.original_text: "If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ose imaginer les conséquences auxquelles nous nous exposons si la situation n'est pas réglée rapidement ! Il existe des mondes qui sont ravagés par la guerre pendant des générations... Des générations, Votre Seigneurie ! Comme cette planète dérangée près de l'astre sans nom, si proche de notre système paisible. Il paraît que ses habitants vivent sous la protection du libre-marchand Winterscale... Je tremble à l'idée de ce qu'il a pu créer là-bas ! »

languages.text: "Bu şekilde devam ederse sonumuz nice olur hayal bile edemiyorum! Nesiller boyu savaşla harap olan dünyalar var... Nesiller diyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Meçhul Yıldız'ın yanındaki dengesiz gezegen mesela, bizim sakin sistemimize çok yakınlar. Oradaki sakinler sözde Hür Tacir Winterscale'in himayesinde yaşıyor. Kim bilir orada neler yapıyorlar..."
languages.original_text: "If things continue in this vein, I dare not even imagine what it could lead to! There are worlds that are ravaged by war for generations... generations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Like that deranged planet by the Nameless Star — so close to our own peaceful system. The inhabitants there supposedly live under the patronage of Rogue Trader Winterscale — I shudder to think what he has created there!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu şekilde devam ederse sonumuz nice olur hayal bile edemiyorum! Nesiller boyu savaşla harap olan dünyalar var... Nesiller diyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Meçhul Yıldız'ın yanındaki dengesiz gezegen mesela, bizim sakin sistemimize çok yakınlar. Oradaki sakinler sözde Hür Tacir Winterscale'in himayesinde yaşıyor. Orada neler yapıyorlar kim bilir?"
